name: Dwarven Delve (Canceled)
blurb: An Action Puzzle Crawl in which you configure dungeon layouts on the fly using rotating hex tiles. Think "Pipe Mania" meets "Diablo".

rewards.reward:
Scribe
============================= 
Digital Rewards ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
One game unlock + Your name inscribed for all time upon the Founders clan stone on DwarvenDelve.com

Tinker Apprentice
============================= 
Digital Rewards ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
One game unlock + Beta access for early playtesting in November + Your name inscribed for all time upon the Founders clan stone on DwarvenDelve.com

Deep Scout
=============================
Digital Rewards
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Two game unlocks (1 for you, 1 for a friend) 
+ Your name inscribed for all time upon the Founders clan stone on DwarvenDelve.com

Keeper of Portents
=============================
Digital Rewards
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Two game unlocks (1 for you, 1 for a friend) 
+ Deluxe Digital Art Pack (Dwarven Delve wall papers, avatars, icons) 
+ Beta access for early playtesting in November 
+ Your name in the game credits
+ Your name inscribed for all time upon the Founders clan stone on DwarvenDelve.com

Gloambane
=============================
Digital Rewards
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Two game unlocks (1 for you, 1 for a friend) 
+ Gloambane Relic Set — 1 ancestral relic each for the Warbeard & Godbinder characters 
+ Deluxe Digital Art Pack (Dwarven Delve wall papers, avatars, icons) 
+ Beta access for early playtesting in November 
+ Your name in the game credits
+ Your name inscribed for all time upon the Founders clan stone on DwarvenDelve.com

+ Gloambane Relic Set for Warbeard and Godbinder characters 
+ Deluxe Digital Art Pack (Dwarven Delve wall papers, avatars, icons)
+ Beta access for early playtesting in November 
+ Your name in the game credits
+ Your name inscribed for all time upon the Founders clan stone on DwarvenDelve.com

Clan Elder
=============================

Two game unlocks (1 for you, 1 for a friend)

=============================
Physical Rewards
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
"Delver’s Journal" a series of 5 PHYSICAL postcards mailed to your door over the course of 5 weeks from the dwarves' expedition into the deep. 1 postcard from each region, with special notes and secrets about the region being highlighted.
